channel	forward	backward
π⁻π⁰$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁻	1.0051725425754405	1.002539587690469
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁰	0.9980579623543471	0.9986741858380638
π⁰π⁺$\leftrightarrow$ρ⁺	0.9980019420376456	0.9975537795040333
π⁻π⁺$\leftrightarrow$σ	1.0162367572547213	1.0169276830953478
2$\times$(π⁰π⁰$\leftrightarrow$σ)	0.9820359281437125	0.9847996315062184
# SMASH-1.8
